name: Zmaaone - internship simulator
description:
Welcome to Zmaaone !

Your job, as our new underpaid intern, is to sort packages by linking smartly together our different mechanisms. But be careful, doing so is far from easy since you need to time everything just right !

How to play :

  • Your job as a Zmaaone's intern is to sort packages : yellow ones in yellow tubing and blue ones in blue tubing.
  • To do so, you need to connect pistons to the generator with wiring. You can do so by entering the building mode (by clicking on the button at your right).
  • Once in building mode, you can place wiring with the left click and switch between normal wiring and diode with the right click.
  • You can also rotate diodes by pressing R and destroy what's under the cursor by pressing E.
  • The difference between diode and wiring is that diode only allow the current to flow trough one direction (indicated by the arrow of the diode)

Manage your timing and the generator's current to achieve your goal of being a well know underpaid employee of Zmaaone !
